message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our top-of-the-line product! It's a game-changer in its industry and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000. This is a great deal, considering its value to me is at least $8000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your offer of $7500. However, I'm still a bit above that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $8250. This is a very competitive price, and I think you'll find it's a great value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $8250. I'm thinking more along the lines of $7000. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I can offer it to you for $7800. This is a very competitive price, and I think you'll find it's a great value. I'm not sure I can go any lower than this, but I'm willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $7800. I'm thinking more along the lines of $7250. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $7500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great value for the product. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to make the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise, but I'm still a bit above $7500. I'm thinking more along the lines of $7000. Can you meet me at that price?
